body: Use "s" to switch player positions on screen but the play card animation still thinks AI is at the top.
author: [lodici123](https://code.google.com/u/lodici123/)
title: Animation not in sync if players are switched.
content:
_From [lodici123](https://code.google.com/u/lodici123/) on September 07, 2014 18:25:45_

Use "s" to switch player positions on screen but the play card animation still thinks AI is at the top.
